page.title: 04Work in and near Well
page.content: This is essentially a working village with 38 in agriculture and 21 in allied jobs.A futher 31 work locally and 27 in nearby Masham,Bedale,Ripon & Northallerton.Of the 16 who work at distance, some commute but most are representatives who may also work abroad.No-one in the village is out of work although 2 young men in outlying cottages have just ended seasonal jobs 1 craftsman,a glass engraver has no regular work.29 women are housewives, including mothers of young children, farmers wives and others doing backup work of all kinds.Part-time work covers Home Helps,housework and gardening.Seasonal work formerly potato picking,now involves the preparation of green veg. for market. Lack of transport limits the work for girls;boys often help on farms or deliver free newspapers.
